msg: Fixing bug in scheduler failover, led to some refactoring to share code.

msg: Created per-framework FrameworkInfo object to enable future bookkeeping.

author: benh
msg: Making memhog-executor support per-task arguments so that it can be used

author: benh
msg: A few fixes to LXC isolation module:
- Kill an executor if we can't set one of its resource limits. (This is
rather harsh, but we can replace it with something smarter later. At
least it maintains the "correctness" of the isolation.)
- Redirect IO to files properly (wasn't happening before due to a typo)
